data.name: labelInfo.Text
data.value: Then you click "Apply" button, for each document's file in the module, a file with the same name will be searched in the selected folder. If there is such a file, the document could be published automatically. You also can choose to unpublish skipped documents and delete (or not) old files.

data.name: labelFolder.Help
data.value: Please select a folder to search files in.

data.name: labelDeleteOldFiles.Help
data.value: Check to delete the files of documents, for which corresponding file will be found in the target folder. Note what file will be deleted only then it isn't referenced by other documents.

data.name: labelUnpublishSkipped.Help
data.value: Check to unpublish all documents, for which no corresponding file will be found in the target folder.

data.name: labelPublishUpdated.Help
data.value: Check to publish all documents, for which corresponding file will be found in the target folder.

data.name: labelUpdateDefaultFolder.Help
data.value: Check to update default folder value in the module settings.
